name: Failed Mission: Titan Hope
description:
Made for Black and White Jam #5^π in 10 days.

This is a puzzle game. You need to fix your spaceship to get back home.

"I'm still on the run after the failure of the "Titan Hope" colonization mission.
There have been several casualties and now I'm alone on this big spaceship, but finally I can go home..."

Controls: 
A, D - move
SPACE - action
